about_the_game:
You've immersed yourself in the thrilling VR gameplay of Max Mustard, now treat your eardrums to the full Digital Soundtrack! Featuring 19 catchy tracks, we invite you to chill out to the vibes of the Grasslands, get pumped with intense boss music, and experience tracks created and performed by the world's best beatboxer, Tom Thumb.

So get the speakers pumping with this catchy soundtrack from our vibrant VR platformer. It'll make you feel like you never took off your headset. Take the sound of Max Mustard with you anywhere, any time, and grab the full digital soundtrack now!
